alert.note: Alert for Horry; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 07 at 9:34PM EDT until September 08 at 11:37AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Carolina... Little Pee Dee River At Galivants Ferry affecting Horry and Marion Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Carolina... Waccamaw River At Conway affecting Horry County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in North Carolina... Northeast Cape Fear River Near Burgaw affecting Pender County. For the Waccamaw River...including Aiw At old Hwy 544 At Socastee, Conway, Above Conway, Freeland, Longs...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Little Pee Dee River at Galivants Ferry. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Flood waters will begin to affect residential yards in the Fork Retch community upstream of Galivants Ferry near the town of Nichols. Swampland flooding becomes noticeable and natural boat landings will be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 9.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 7.8 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Little Pee Dee River Galivants Ferry 9.0 9.1 Thu 9 pm EDT 8.5 8.3 8.1 &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by this evening.
